message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product of significant value.  While I can't disclose specifics at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me.  I'm offering it to you at a price of $1500000, which I believe represents a fair and mutually beneficial deal.  This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know your decision as soon as possible.
